Project_Title: Characterization of serum small extracellular vesicles and their small RNA contents across human, rat, and mouse
Project_Description: In the present study, the isolated serum exosomes from healthy adults, rats and mice were comparatively characterized; the small RNA compositions were analyzed; the serum exosome miRNA profiles and exosome depleted serum miRNA profiles were obtained by small RNAseq, and the distributions of miRNA component inside and outside of the serum exosomes were also compared.
